original_text: Then Moses called to the Lord for help. The Lord showed Moses a special tree. Moses threw a branch into the water. Then the water became good for them to drink. There at Marah, the Lord made a law for the Israelites to obey. He tested them there, to see if they would trust him. Then Moses called to the Lord for help. The Lord showed Moses a special tree. Moses threw a branch into the water. Then the water became good for them to drink. There at Marah, the Lord made a law for the Israelites to obey. He tested them there, to see if they would trust him. Then Moses called to the Lord for help. The Lord showed Moses a special tree. Moses threw a branch into the water. Then the water became good for them to drink.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께 부르짖었더니 여호와께서 그에게 한 나무를 가리키시니 그가 물에 던지니 물이 달게 되었더라 거기서 여호와께서 그들을 위하여 법도와 율례를 정하시고 그들을 시험하실새

sentences.original_text: Then Moses called to the Lord for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세는 도움을 요청하기 위해 주님께 부르짖었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord showed Moses a special tree.
Moses threw a branch into the water.
Then the water became good for them to drink.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 물은 그들이 마시기 좋게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There at Marah,
the Lord made a law for the Israelites to obey.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 이스라엘 백성이 순종해야 할 법을 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He tested them there,
to see if they would trust him.
Then Moses called to the Lord for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세는 도움을 요청하기 위해 주님께 부르짖었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord showed Moses a special tree.
Moses threw a branch into the water.
Then the water became good for them to drink.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 물은 그들이 마시기 좋게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There at Marah,
the Lord made a law for the Israelites to obey.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 이스라엘 백성이 순종해야 할 법을 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He tested them there,
to see if they would trust him.
Then Moses called to the Lord for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세는 도움을 요청하기 위해 주님께 부르짖었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord showed Moses a special tree.
Moses threw a branch into the water.
Then the water became good for them to drink.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 물은 그들이 마시기 좋게 되었습니다.
